text:

text:
Mott Street, at the N.W. corner of Hester Street. Also shown is Hester Street, west from Mott, to and including Centre Streets.

August 28, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

172 Hester Street, adjoining the N.W. corner of Mott Street. Building concerned is a 4-story frame house.

1932.

J. Clarence Davies Collection, Museum of the City of New York.

August 15, 1932.

P. L. Sperr.

text:
Peddlers, Refreshments, Hot dogs: A set of 3 views of individuals that cater to an itinerant group. No. 1 is at an unknown location on the lower East Side; No. 2, at the N.W. corner of Mott and Hester Streets, and No. 3 at Roosevelt and New Chambers Streets.

1923.
View 2:-August 15, 1933.
View 3:-October 24, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.

VIEW 1 NEG #3503

text:
Feast of Maria S. S. Immaculato: The 18th annual celebration of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary. The shrine is at the N. E. corner of Mott and Hester Streets.

1937

Alexander Alland

This photo is one of a series that appeared in the published volume "Portrait of N. Y." by Felix Reisenberg and Alex. Alland, IRGV.
title: Feast of Maria S.S. Immacolato [Feast of the Assumption of the Blessed Virgin Mary.]
